summary: Another version of the Expelliarmus shout that replaces the Disarm shout instead of the Unrelenting Force one.
descriptionHtml:
After uploading the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61445/?]Expelliarmus Shout - Unrelenting Force Replacer [/url]it's been brought to my attention by some users that a Disarm shout does exist. Hence, I made this alternative version which replaces said shout. I used the same sounds so, again, you have the [i]femaleeventoned[/i] and [i]maleeventoned[/i] options to download.

Happy shouting! :)
author: DigitalWolf

files.name: Expelliarmus Shout - Disarm Replacer - Male Eventoned Version
files.fileName: Expelliarmus Shout - Disarm Replacer - Male Eventoned Version-61497-1-0.rar

files.name: Expelliarmus Shout - Disarm Replacer - Female Eventoned Version
